name: Cleft Fencer
description:
This title is inspired by one of my favourite games Hollow Knight and it's in the development phase. There is not much to do know. But some basic abilities have already been made, so you can try them.

Controls:

WASD - movement

Space - Jump/Double jump, the longer you hold the higher will the character jump | Wall jump is also implemented, if you want to jump on the wall hold the space and buttons A or D corresponding to the direction where the wall is. If you want to jump from wall hold space plus A or D corresponding to the direction opposite where the wall is.

Shift - Dash

Shoot - tap E 

Heal - hold E for a small amount of time and then let go

Escape - Menu

Each time you hit enemy with sword you get a piece of mana. You can shoot/heal if you have enough of it.

There is currency in the game but you can't do anything with it just yet. Shops and the upgrades which will be available for sale from merchants are in development.
